程序包 util

类 Util

java.lang.Object
util.Util
public class Util
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to store some commonly used tools in projects
从以下版本开始:
16 April 2021
版本:
1.0
作者:
Jufeng Sun, Zai Song

    构造器 说明
    Util()  

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型 方法 说明
    static boolean isEmailLegal​(java.lang.String email)
    Used to determine whether the email is legal.
    static boolean isNickNameLegal​(java.lang.String nickName)
    Used to determine whether the user's nickname is legal, User nickname can only consist of numbers and letters.
    static int isPhoneLegal​(java.lang.String phone)
    Used to determine whether the phone number is legal, The phone number can only consist of digits, and the length must be eleven.
    static boolean isVideoTypeLegal​(java.lang.String type)
    Used to determine whether the video type is legal, Video type can only consist of numbers and letters.
    static void showDialog​(java.awt.Component component, java.lang.String info)
    Used to show the optionDialog with a OK button.
    static java.util.Date strToDate​(java.lang.String strDate)
    This method is used to convert String to Date
    static java.sql.Time strToTime​(java.lang.String strDate)
    This method is used to convert String to Time
    static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toArrayList​(java.lang.Object[] args)
    This method is used to convert Object array to {@link ArrayList<>}

    从类继承的方法 java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • 方法详细资料

    • isNickNameLegal

      public static boolean isNickNameLegal​(java.lang.String nickName)
      Used to determine whether the user's nickname is legal, User nickname can only consist of numbers and letters.
      参数:
      nickName - String which need to determine whether the user's nickname is legal
      返回:
      true: User nickname is legal, false: User nickname is not legal

    • isPhoneLegal

      public static int isPhoneLegal​(java.lang.String phone)
      Used to determine whether the phone number is legal, The phone number can only consist of digits, and the length must be eleven.
      参数:
      phone - String which need to determine whether the phone number is legal
      返回:
      true: Phone number is legal, false: Phone number is not legal

    • isEmailLegal

      public static boolean isEmailLegal​(java.lang.String email)
      Used to determine whether the email is legal.
      参数:
      email - String which need to determine whether the email is legal
      返回:
      true: Email is legal, false: Email is not legal

    • showDialog

      public static void showDialog​(java.awt.Component component, java.lang.String info)
      Used to show the optionDialog with a OK button.
      参数:
      component - The parent component that called this method
      info - Message to be displayed

    • isVideoTypeLegal

      public static boolean isVideoTypeLegal​(java.lang.String type)
      Used to determine whether the video type is legal, Video type can only consist of numbers and letters.
      参数:
      type - String which need to determine whether the phone number is legal
      返回:
      true: Video type is legal, false: Video type is not legal

    • toArrayList

      public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> toArrayList​(java.lang.Object[] args)
      This method is used to convert Object array to {@link ArrayList<>}
      参数:
      args - Data to be converted
      返回:
      ArrayList The converted ArrayList

    • strToTime

      public static java.sql.Time strToTime​(java.lang.String strDate)
      This method is used to convert String to Time
      参数:
      strDate - Date string to be converted
      返回:
      Time Corresponding time after conversion

    • strToDate

      public static java.util.Date strToDate​(java.lang.String strDate)
      This method is used to convert String to Date
      参数:
      strDate - Date string to be converted
      返回:
      Date Corresponding date after conversion
